column4: My HDD has a 100mb bootable NTFS partition and the rest ~320gb it is a normal NTFS partition. Can I combine the two partitions without losing data from the big partition?
the 100mb partition is probably the boot partition used by windows 7
yeah it has a win7 loader on it, but I don't need it.

I take it windows is no longer installed? if that's the case, you could delete the 100mb partition and then expand the 320gb partition without losing anything on the 320gb partition, however everything on the 100mb parition will be lost
just make sure NOT to do that the other way around (eg. delete the 320gb and expand the 100mb)
yep Win7 isn't installed anymore. Thanks
